quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superflous.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernand Shaw

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
